short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly compress and convert your images with a simple drag-and-drop interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the "EZ Image Compressor and Converter" Chrome Extension! Effortlessly compress and convert your images with a simple drag-and-drop interface. Choose your preferred format (JPEG, PNG, or WEBP) and customize compression rates for optimal results. Download the processed images instantly with a user-friendly interface, making image management easier than ever.
